ed0f276d2de47f9949286ced235dbcab: create extension if not exists "uuid-ossp"; create table if not exists todos ( created_at  timestamp   default now(), todo_id     uuid        primary key default uuid_generate_v4(), title       text        not null default '', done        boolean     default false )
8dbd934db66a7aaf28a1b9bd26324491: select * from todos order by created_at
bf758de6ab6ca62339b4162655c7f539: insert into todos ( title ) values ( $(title) ) returning *
2e7f598aa485d72d9edc4236081515bf: update todos set done = $(done) where todo_id = $(todo_id) returning *
64027152cc802ac022ce0e16086ff903: update todos set title = $(title) where todo_id = $(todo_id)
